citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The research facility has had significant drift in their timeline to conduct IACUC functions. The facility's IACUC meets
twice a year to conduct a program review, facility inspection, and report to the IO. The facility was previously on a Feb-
Aug timeline. In 2023, the IACUC conducted it's semi-annual review and facility inspection Feb 17th, then Sept 28th, at a
7 month interval. In 2024, the IACUC conducted it's semi-annual review and facility inspection March 11th, then Nov 12th,
at an 8 month interval. The semi-annual review and facility inspection was next conducted April 8, 2025. It is important
that program reviews and facility inspections be conducted in a timely manner at appropriate intervals so that problems
can be identified and addressed before they progress and become detrimental to the health and well-being of research
animals. Correct by conducting program reviews, facility inspections, and submitting reports to the Institutional official at
least every 6 months or more frequently. Correct by 10/31/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
